DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the efficacy of etanercept and sulphasalazine in the treatment of Ankylosing Spondylitis.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Etanercept and Sulphasalazine in Ankylosing Spondylitis
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of ankylosing spondylitis Active ankylosing spondylitis Complete ankylosis of spine Previous treatment with etanercept
